wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Leslie Wood (20 December 1932 – 24 January 2005) was an English footballer. A goalkeeper, he played 33 league games in the Football League, mostly for Barrow. He was also signed to Bolton Wanderers, Huddersfield Town, Port Vale, and Southport.

response: * Leslie Wood (footballer) (Thomas Leslie Wooborn, 1932–2005), English footballer
